title: client crash after hotfix in champion select
body: Um...after you guys patched the client going black now my client just randomly crashes in champion select and i lost my diamond promos thanks to it....ive now lost diamond promos and about 43lp in total due to the bugs in champion select with the client....

replies.body:
Hey Mzsunday,

Are you still having this issue? There were some bugs that went out with the patch which they hotfixed. If you are still having this issue, please perform the steps on the [Bug Splats & Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) article. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
